title: Updated ! Wood Floors! Washer/Dryer Included!
posting_body: Stylish living with the convenience of easy access to the I-30 and Highway 360.
You are only minutes from The Dallas Cowboys Stadium, Six Flags Over Texas, The Texas Rangers Ballpark, and the DFW Airport.

Community Amenities: Perimeter Fence, Outdoor Grills, Picnic Area, Reserved Covered Parking, Fitness Center, Bark Park, Clubhouse With Lounge & Free WIFI, Gated Entrance, Sparkling Pool, Business Center, Coffee & Tea Bar

Unit Amenities: Cable ready, Walk-in closets, Storage Closet Outside, W/D, Ice makers, Wood Flooring, Premium Countertops, , Frost Free Refrigerators, Garbage Disposals, Miniblinds, Dishwashers, Full-Size Washers & Dryers In Every Unit, Private Patios/Balconies, Ceiling Fans, Microwaves, Self cleaning Ovens, Pantry, and Much More
